title: User Profile Edit and Preferences
description: As a registered user, I want to edit my profile information and set preferences so that my account reflects my current details and personalized settings.
acceptance_criteria: User can update: name, email, phone number, profile picture
Email changes require verification via confirmation link
User can manage multiple shipping addresses
User can set default shipping and billing addresses
User can update communication preferences (email, SMS)
Changes are validated before saving (format checks)
User receives confirmation message after successful update
System maintains audit log of profile changes

comments.author: Security Team
comments.text: Ensure password re-authentication for sensitive changes like email update.

comments.author: Developer
comments.text: Implemented image upload with validation (max 5MB, jpg/png only).
